item.title: Suomi Client v1.0 -------worth to look--------
item.dc:creator: @mige5 mige5
item.description:
@mige5 wrote:

I made a Client base in Finnish…

PICS:

2u59dh5.jpg1066×730

DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.megaupload.com/fi/?d=PFP35KSO

btw, lots of models added

ps. this is only a client side project… not gonna do the items,npcs and objects for the client, but if some1 wants to do that heres how to do it:

tänne class8.java (items):

if(i == ITEMID) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; // poista tämä rivi, jos itemin eka optioni on: use class8.aStringArray189[1] = "WEAR/WIELD"; // poista tämä rivi, jos itemin eka optioni on: use class8.aString170 = "ITEMNAME"; class8.aByteArray178 = "EXAMINEINFO".getBytes(); }

tänne class5.java (NPCS):

if(i == NPCID){ class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "EKA OPTIONI"; // esim. Attack class5.aString65 = "NPCNAME"; class5.aByteArray89 = "EXAMINEINFO".getBytes(); }

tänne class46.java (objects):

if(i == OBJECTID) { class46.aStringArray786 = new String[786]; class46.aStringArray786[1] = "EKA OPTIONI"; // esim. Mine class46.aString739 = "OBJECTNAME"; class46.aByteArray777 = "EXAMINEINFO".getBytes(); class46.aBoolean778 = true; class46.aBoolean767 = true; class46.aBoolean762 = false; class46.aBoolean769 = false; }

tai näin: (en oo varma, kokeile, ite käytän ylempää)

if(i == OBJECTID) { class46.aStringArray786 = new String[786]; class46.aStringArray786[1] = "EKA OPTIONI"; // esim. Mine class46.aString739 = "OBJECTNAME"; class46.aByteArray777 = "EXAMINEINFO".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
